org.dellroad.stuff.dao

Class QueryCallback<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dellroad.stuff.dao.QueryCallback<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - query return type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TypedQueryCallback, UpdateCallback

    public abstract class QueryCallback<R>
extends Object
    Helper class for building and executing JPA queries.

    • Method Detail

      • query

        public R query(EntityManager entityManager)
        Perform the query and return its result.

        The implementation in QueryCallback simply delegates to buildQuery(javax.persistence.EntityManager) and then executeQuery(javax.persistence.Query). Subclasses may override if desired.

        Parameters:
        entityManager - JPA EntityManager representing an open transaction
        Returns:
        result of query

      • buildQuery

        protected abstract Query buildQuery(EntityManager entityManager)
        Build the query.
        Parameters:
        entityManager - JPA EntityManager representing an open transaction
        Returns:
        constructed JPA Query to perform

      • executeQuery

        protected abstract R executeQuery(Query query)
        Execute the query.
        Parameters:
        query - the Query constructed by buildQuery(javax.persistence.EntityManager)
        Returns:
        result of query
